1947775561585611002.Text: I have Droops. I can barely move and I have no strength.

335814206187176520.Text: Yes. I have Ash-Chancre. Look at my face! My hands! That is why the others stay away from me. You'd better stay away, too, if you know what's good for you.

32381159192783722455.Text: In Morrowind you worry about three kinds of disease -- common disease, blight disease, and corprus disease. Common disease isn't so bad. You can get cured at shrines or temples easily -- but you need to get cured, or people don't want to talk with you. Blight disease is more serious, and potions and cures are harder come by. Corprus disease can't be cured. And some say vampirism is a disease. But the only cure for a vampire is destroying it. Policy on vampires is 'kill on sight.' Or 'run on sight.'
